reqs:
Pre-reqs: One of MATH 220, MATH 226. (and 6 credits of MATH courses numbered 300 or higher.)
This section is restricted to BA students in the mathematics major in year 4 and the cap is strict. Note that there are other courses that will meet the BA research and writing requirement and so once MATH 444 is full, students will be directed to find another course to meet this graduation requirement.
description: Current research topics in pure and applied mathematics are explored at the undergraduate level. Technical communication and research skills are developed.
